title: Intelligent Auto-Extraction
spec:
## Intelligent Auto-Extraction

### Goal
Automatically extract structured fields (ICP, pain points, value props) from the free-text strategy body using AI.

### Behavior
- **Trigger**: After auto-save completes, if body changed significantly (>50 chars delta)
- **Extraction**: AI reads strategy body and populates/updates structured fields
- **Review**: Extracted values appear as suggestions (yellow highlight) until user confirms
- **Scope**: ICP, industry, company size, pain points, value propositions, key messaging

### Technical Approach
- Background job triggered by save webhook
- Claude API with structured output (JSON schema)
- Diff extracted fields against current values; only suggest changes
- `PATCH /api/strategies/:id/suggestions` stores pending suggestions
- UI shows inline diff with Accept/Reject per field

### Acceptance Criteria
- Given a user writes a strategy paragraph mentioning "Series A SaaS companies with 50-200 employees", when auto-save fires, then ICP fields are suggested with those values
- Given extracted values match existing fields, then no suggestion is created (no noise)
- Given user rejects a suggestion, it is not re-suggested unless the source text changes
